DOC.brief_summary: Neuromonics TInnitus Treatment CALM study multi site study 100 adult subject clinically significant disturb tinnitus evaluate outcome measure use FDA clear Neuromonics treatment 6 , 12 , 24 36 month . Patients must meet certain inclusion criterion also required pay cost treatment . Subjects provide modest participation fee 6 , 12 , 24 36 month upon completion patient questionnaire ( subject must access computer internet order complete line questionnaire ) .
DOC.brief_title: Customized Acoustic Stimulation Long Term Medical Benefit Relief Tinnitus Hyperacusis
DOC.criteria: 18 year age , TRQ least 17 , Able pay treatment , Not use treatment tinnitus , Access computer internet , Compliant patient Hearing PTA > 50 dB , score HADS great 11 anxiety depression scale , Not willing follow protocol
